text: Any <https://tailwindcss.com/|Tailwind CSS> users here? As an experiment, I starting playing around with converting the theme boilerplate to Tailwind using gulp. I’m curious if anyone else has done something similar or if anyone finds this useful/interesting? <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/pull/251/files#>

Good morning!  I am working on testing out custom objects.  I have built one in a development test portal, but when I attempt to add a record to the object from the UI, I get a permissions issue.  The account is "super admin" for the test portal.  Is there another step that must be performed?
I started something similar as well actually.
had to rip out most of the colors bc the file wouldn’t upload to hs using the cli workflow.

but I’m importing a separate stylesheet that uses tailwind and postcss and uses the hs theme variables as css custom properties although many of them still need alternate considerations for parsing the value correctly.
Re: not uploading, was there a problem with the code or was it the file size limit?
the color picker values in particular were hard to convert to custom properties since the theme I started with used a macro to parse it which I can’t do in postcss
